previous.excerpt:
Like many Americans, former presidents Jimmy Carter, Bill Clinton, George W. Bush and Barack Obama watched in shock as rioters rampaged through the Capitol Wednesday. Clinton said “the match was lit by President Trump and his most ardent supporters.” NBC’s Stephanie Gosk reports for TODAY.
» Subscribe to TODAY: http://on.today.com/SubscribeToTODAY
» Watch the latest from TODAY: http://bit.ly/LatestTODAY

About: TODAY brings you the latest headlines and expert tips on money, health and parenting. We wake up every morning to give you and your family all you need to start your day. If it matters to you, it matters to us. We are in the people business. Subscribe to our channel for exclusive TODAY archival footage & our original web series.  

Connect with TODAY Online!
Visit TODAY's Website: http://on.today.com/ReadTODAY
Find TODAY on Facebook: http://on.today.com/LikeTODAY
Follow TODAY on Twitter: http://on.today.com/FollowTODAY
Follow TODAY on Instagram: http://on.today.com/InstaTODAY
Follow TODAY on Pinterest: http://on.today.com/PinTODAY

localize.title: 前总统在国会山骚乱后呼吁团结|今天
localize.description:
像许多美国人一样，前总统吉米·卡特、比尔·克林顿、乔治·W·布什和巴拉克·奥巴马周三震惊地看着暴徒横冲直撞地穿过国会大厦。克林顿说，“这场比赛是由特朗普总统和他最热心的支持者点燃的。”NBC的斯蒂芬妮·高斯克今天将带来报道。

next.excerpt:
More room for adventure. Watch the full reveal to get your first look at the All-New 3-row Grand Cherokee L.


For more than 75 years, the Jeep name has been indelibly associated with freedom, authenticity, adventure and passion. These are vehicles for “dreamers and doers”–forging extraordinary, uncommon bonds between themselves and their owners, because adventure is found in every Jeep vehicle’s DNA. The Jeep badge stands for more than a brand. In truth, it’s a badge of honor.

Subscribe to the #Jeep brand YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/Jeep 

Follow The Jeep brand on Social: 
· Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jeep 
· Twitter: https://twitter.com/jeep 
· Instagram: https://instagram.com/jeep
next.title: Jeep® | 2021 Grand Cherokee L | Reveal

localize.title: Jeep®|2021年大切诺基L|揭幕
localize.description:
更多的冒险空间。观看完整的展示，让你第一次看到全新的3排大切诺基L。


75多年来，吉普这个名字一直与自由、真实、冒险和激情联系在一起，这是不可磨灭的。这些都是“梦想家和实干家”的工具-在他们和他们的主人之间建立起非凡的、不同寻常的纽带，因为冒险存在于每辆吉普车的DNA中。吉普徽章代表的不仅仅是一个品牌。事实上，这是荣誉的象征。

订阅#Jeep 品牌Youtube频道：https://www.youtube.com/Jeep

在社交网站上关注吉普品牌：
·脸书：https://www.facebook.com/jeep
·推特：https://twitter.com/jeep
·Instagram：https://instagram.com/jeep

localize.title: Jeep®|2021年大切諾基L|揭幕
localize.description:
更多的冒險空間。觀看完整的展示，讓你第一次看到全新的3排大切諾基L。


75多年來，吉普這個名字一直與自由、真實、冒險和激情聯繫在一起，這是不可磨滅的。這些都是“夢想家和實幹家”的工具-在他們和他們的主人之間建立起非凡的、不同尋常的紐帶，因爲冒險存在於每輛吉普車的DNA中。吉普徽章代表的不僅僅是一個品牌。事實上，這是榮譽的象徵。

訂閱#Jeep 品牌Youtube頻道：https://www.youtube.com/Jeep

在社交網站上關注吉普品牌：
·臉書：https://www.facebook.com/jeep
·推特：https://twitter.com/jeep
·Instagram：https://instagram.com/jeep
